title: What are the odds, right?
body:
https://i.imgflip.com/1rkmvt.jpg

https://i.imgflip.com/1rkmze.jpg

I think League just made a couple. There's no way this isn't destiny.

replies.body:
You erased the names for one picture but not the other.

I still upvoted though, that's funny.

Eh, I figured the names were small enough. And I had already made the first one, and didn't feel like going back and editing it.

Sooooooooooo..... Yeah.
You gotta be really malicious to try and read those tiny names.

> [{quoted}](name=Kriske,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FVMKmvW6,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-06-27T07:00:09.746+0000)
>
> You gotta be really malicious to try and read those tiny names.

Or you can open up the original link and it's rather easy for most of them.
If you go to the link its pretty obvious.
the war of f for flash and d for flash wages on.
Obviously Xayah will win as she got Flash on the right key.
That's not how you spell Rakan.
Doesn't "The Rakan key" sound weird?

...not if you say it like i do "rock-on"

then i put my 80's hairband wig on and headbang to fur elise played through a synthesizer that mimics the sound of a thousand mating orangutans until i lose consciousness and pass out on my keyboard foaming at the mouth. later i wake up and realize i've been removed from queue for failing to lock in my pick and suffer yet another queue dodge penalty. but it wasnt my fault. it was the government for putting neurotransmitters in my mocha latte coffee el grande. never forget. that is all.
Kled main?
XD Welp, you don't do things by halves... +1 for dedication
I'll bring The Flash Song in here if I have to. You might learn something. :P

F is for Flash, so you can make big plays,
D is for Dumb Ignite!
G is for ping spamming all over your team!
Out here on Summoner's Rift!

no no

F is for fire, burning the people
D is for Dashing, for the big plays
(and) G is ping spamming, all over the map

Out here on (the) summoners rift.
https://media.giphy.com/media/3oz8xLd9DJq2l2VFtu/giphy.gif
https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--E1Nhy2W3--/c_scale,f_auto,fl_progressive,q_80,w_800/pbx6j22pvfcy6nqdvouy.gif

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GXzqTZ-bUAs

Educate yourself.
this is f-for-flashscist propoganda. D is for flash.

http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/pages/2016/february/f-fla/graph-winrate.jpg

Proven wrong, Flash on D is superior by a large margin! Grey Face no space
My friend has flash on space and thinks it's weird that everyone doesn't do that.
i play league with a guitar hero controller. my flash is on the whammy bar.
Definately a kled main.
I thought about doing that but I decided to use spacebar for item active 7 so I can put pots there or Locket.
I use space to center my camera onto my champ since i use free screen.

As a summoner who started a couple months ago I thought I was the only one who thought of that 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

they complement one another

now let's stop
you scribbled out the name on the bottom picture but not the top...?
You posted the same comment as the top one in the thread...?

> [{quoted}](name=Glory ln Death,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FVMKmvW6,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-06-27T19:12:42.403+0000)
>
> You posted the same comment as the top one in the thread...?

I dont pay attention to other people nor do i care about others
Ooh edgy, are you gonna main the new champion Kayn or are you already in relationship? {{champion:157}}?

Alas, their relationship lasted less than a season.
Wonder if Xayah regrets teasing and then pushing Rakan away all the time now?
so who won?
We (Rakan's team) did. But it definitely wasn't because of Rakan - he basically ignored all objectives in the game.

Mandatory column-based shipping confirmed.

... I don't even wanna think about the other four ships on that loading screen though.

I don't know, bot lane seems fine. 

The two, starstruck snipers, separated by the cruel law - one forced to uphold it, one driven to break it! A tragic romance at its finest!

And a dead man, brought back from his rest and driven mad with bloodlust by dark magic, who finds an anchor to settle his rage in the gentle love of a young mermaid seeking to save her people. The tale of an unusual couple who must face all odds to save an entire species!
B-but {{champion:498}} Ruined it by not having Nightbringer Yasuo as her Icon. I'm done with this game, see you all in Dota
New meta inc. Better nerf rito
